name: Email Assis for Lead Management AI Workflow

attributes.name: senderName
attributes.description: Extract the sender's name from the email. If the name is not available, return an empty string.

options.systemPromptTemplate: You are an extraction expert. Identify and extract only the key information from the text. If a required attribute is not present, return an empty string as its value.

categories.description: This includes inquiries about course services, pricing, availability, or related details.
This includes scheduling initial consultations or follow-up appointments.
Inquiries about paid collab, payments, or refund requests
Emails that don't fall into any of the predefined categories.

options.systemPromptTemplate: Please share with me the specific {categories} that you would like to use so I can perform the analysis correctly. Once you have provided the categories, I will deliver the answer in JSON format, without explanations.

parameters.content:
## Automated Email Lead Management System (AI-Powered)

### What This Workflow Does
This system automatically manages inbound email replies, classifies intent, labels conversations, and triggers the right response ‚Äî without manual effort.

It turns your inbox into a **self-operating lead qualification engine**.

---

### Core Workflow Breakdown

#### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Email Trigger (Gmail)
- Listens for incoming replies from leads or prospects.
- Works in real-time, no polling delays.

#### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Information Extraction (AI)
- Extracts key details from email body:
  - Sender intent
  - Name (if present)
  - Context of the reply
- Handles unstructured, messy human emails.

#### 3Ô∏è‚É£ Name Detection Logic
- If name is found ‚Üí enrich lead profile.
- If not ‚Üí continues with fallback logic.
- Ensures clean CRM-ready data.

#### 4Ô∏è‚É£ Intent Classification (AI Text Classifier)
Classifies each reply into buckets like:
- Interested
- Not Interested
- Pricing / Budget
- Follow-up Later
- Support / Existing Customer
- Spam / Irrelevant

This removes human judgment bias and saves time.

#### 5Ô∏è‚É£ Auto-Labeling in Gmail
- Applies smart labels based on intent.
- Keeps inbox clean and searchable.
- Enables downstream automations.

#### 6Ô∏è‚É£ Automated Responses (Optional)
- Sends context-aware replies automatically.
- Different response templates per label.
- Can escalate hot leads to humans instantly.

---

## Why This System Is very Powerful

#### üöÄ Speed
- Zero response delay.
- Leads get acknowledged instantly.

#### üß† Intelligence
- AI understands intent, not just keywords.
- Handles real human language.

#### üßπ Inbox Hygiene
- No more messy inbox.
- Every conversation is categorized.

#### üìà Scalability
- Works for 10 emails or 10,000 emails/day.
- No extra headcount needed.

---

### Who Should Use This

#### Ideal For
- SaaS founders
- Sales teams
- Agencies
- Consultants
- B2B service companies
- Startups handling inbound leads

#### Especially Valuable If
- You miss replies
- You forget follow-ups
- Your team responds inconsistently
- You want faster conversions

---

### Business Impact

#### Measurable Outcomes
- Higher reply-to-conversion rate
- Faster lead qualification
- Reduced manual effort
- Better follow-up discipline
- Cleaner CRM & reporting

---

### What Makes This Different
This is not email automation.  
This is **decision automation**.

The system decides:
- What the lead wants
- How urgent it is
- What should happen next

Humans only step in when it actually matters.

---

### One-Line Summary
**An AI system that reads, understands, labels, and responds to emails like a trained sales assistant ‚Äî 24/7.**
# Manage Leads Using this Email Assistant Workflow
